result.name: employment_and_support_allowance-outcomes_of_work_capability_assessments_great_britain
result.notes:
This report presents information on both new claims and claims undergoing reassessment of incapacity benefits for Employment and Support Allowance (ESA) in Great Britain.  It provides statistics on the outcome of completed assessments, claims still in progress and claims closed before the assessment process is complete.

https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/employment-and-support-allowance-outcomes-of-work-capability-assessment

Source agency: Work and Pensions

Designation: Official Statistics not designated as National Statistics

Language: English

Alternative title: ESA:WCA

organization.name: department-for-work-and-pensions
organization.title: Department for Work and Pensions
organization.description:
The Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) is responsible for welfare and pension policy and is a key player in tackling child poverty. It is the biggest public service delivery department in the UK and serves over 20 million customers.

DWP is a ministerial department, supported by 13 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions

result.title: Employment and Support Allowance: Outcomes of Work Capability Assessments, Great Britain
